Cannot import astropy from source: You appear to be trying to import astropy from within a source checkout or from an editable installation without building the extension modules first. Either run:

  pip install -e .

or

  python setup.py build_ext --inplace

to make sure the extension modules are built
This is expected due to missing extension modules
